resources.string: This is a manual mode. Tap when you hear a took of the train
This is an accelerometer mode. It uses phone\'s sensor to measure the acceleration and then calculates the speed
This is a microphone mode. It uses phone\'s micro to count tooks
This is a gravity mode. It counts vertical changes of phone position. So, basically it works as a manual mode, but it counts tooks in other way
This is a simple gps. It is used for comparison with other modes
You do not have measurements yet
This is auto mode. Is uses every mode (except GPS and Manual) and count the average speed
